channel.title: Whonix VirtualBox 15.0.0.6.6 - Testers Wanted!
channel.description:
https://www.whonix.org/w/images/4/47/Whonix_Facebook_Social_Share.png
Testers Wanted!
Download the Testers-Only version of Whonix for VirtualBox:
https://www.whonix.org/wiki/VirtualBox_Testers_Only_Version
----
Alternatively, in-place release upgrade is possible upgrade using [Whonix testers repository](https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Project-APT-Repository).
----
Notable Changes:
* [fix starting pkexec based applications from start menu](https://forums.whonix.org/t/cannot-use-pkexec/8129) (such as gdebi, synaptic, gparted) * Update Tor Browser to version 9. * https://forums.whonix.org/t/whonix-build-script-now-optionally-supports-installing-packages-from-whonix-remote-repository-rather-than-building-packages-locally/8107 * [use sudoedit rather than lxqtsudo editor](https://forums.whonix.org/t/use-sudoedit-in-whonix-documentation/7599) * [Whonix Networking Implementation Developer Documentation](https://forums.whonix.org/t/whonix-networking-implementation-developer-documentation-feedback-wanted/8274) * usability: [replace default sudo lecture](https://forums.whonix.org/t/disable-or-change-sudo-lecture-at-frist-run-we-trust-you-have-received-the-usual-lecture-from-the-local-system-administrator-it-usually-boils-down-to-these-three-things/8323) * remove deprecated obfs3 from ACW * AppArmor Live Mode fixes * AppArmor enhancements * more seccomp hardening * https://forums.whonix.org/t/restrict-hardware-information-to-root/7329/2 opt-in * https://forums.whonix.org/t/serial-console-in-virtualbox/8021 * fix https://forums.whonix.org/t/swap-swap-file-whonix-gateway-freezing-during-apt-get-dist-upgrade-encrypted-swap-file-creator/8317 * fixed https://forums.whonix.org/t/noscript-with-security-slider-at-safest-permits-around-30-sites/8160 * https://forums.whonix.org/t/send-sysrq-commands-to-virtualbox-usability-helper-virtualbox-send-sysrq/8369 * fix https://forums.whonix.org/t/keyboard-configuration-debconf-popup-during-apt-get-dist-upgrade/8318 * fix https://forums.whonix.org/t/command-not-found-warningcould-not-open-file-etc-apt-sources-list/7903
----
Full difference of all changes:
https://github.com/Whonix/Whonix/compare/15.0.0.4.9-developers-only...15.0.0.6.6-developers-only
----
This release would not have been possible without the numerous supporters of Whonix!
----
Please Donate!
https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Donate

item.title: Whonix VirtualBox 15.0.0.6.6 - Testers Wanted!
item.dc:creator: AnonymousUser
item.description:
This OVA:

synaptic: works.
zulucrypt: works. (I only tested launching it.)
gdebi: works.
gparted: works.
Thunar mounting external drive (VDI): doesn’t work. (despite other packages I install to try and assist with the Thunar mounting. Only my own policykit hack makes it work. This has all been said already.)

So pkexec problems still remain.

Read full topic

item.title: Whonix VirtualBox 15.0.0.6.6 - Testers Wanted!
item.dc:creator: AnonymousUser
item.description:
I’m downloading now, but I want to know if I will be wasting my time or not - as it relates to the pkexec problem, has mounting external drives within whonix (e.g. a vbox VDI virtual hard drive file) been fixed for this OVA?

Read full topic

item.title: Whonix VirtualBox 15.0.0.6.6 - Testers Wanted!
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Testers Wanted!

Download the Testers-Only version of Whonix for VirtualBox:

Whonix

VirtualBox Testers Only Version

Whonix ™ for VirtualBox - Testers Only Version

Alternatively, in-place release upgrade is possible upgrade using Whonix testers repository.

Notable Changes:

  • fix starting pkexec based applications from start menu (such as gdebi, synaptic, gparted)
  • Update Tor Browser to version 9.
  • Whonix build script now optionally supports installing packages from Whonix remote repository rather than building packages locally
  • use sudoedit rather than lxqtsudo editor
  • Whonix Networking Implementation Developer Documentation
  • usability: replace default sudo lecture
  • remove deprecated obfs3 from ACW
  • AppArmor Live Mode fixes
  • AppArmor enhancements
  • more seccomp hardening
  • Restrict hardware information to root opt-in
  • Serial Console in VirtualBox
  • fix swap - swap file - Whonix-Gateway freezing during apt-get dist-upgrade - encrypted swap-file-creator
  • fixed Noscript with Security Slider at Safest permits around 30 sites
  • Send SysRq commands to VirtualBox usability helper - virtualbox-send-sysrq
  • fix keyboard-configuration debconf popup during apt-get dist-upgrade
  • fix command-not-found - WARNING:root:could not open file '/etc/apt/sources.list'

Full difference of all changes:

https://github.com/Whonix/Whonix/compare/15.0.0.4.9-developers-only...15.0.0.6.6-developers-only

This release would not have been possible without the numerous supporters of Whonix!

Please Donate!

Whonix

Donate

PayPal, Bitcoin, Monero, other crypto currencies, etc.

Read full topic
